name: HexReport – Powerful report analytics for WooCommerce
author: WpHex

sections.description:
HexReport is a powerful report analytics WordPress plugin designed to give store owner insightful and real-time analytics of their store. This feature-rich plugin compiles and visualizes key sales metrics, including total completed orders, top-selling products, top-selling category, different sales ratio that includes delivery methods and payment methods, and many more.

HexReport ensures that store owners can utilize these extensive reports to enhance their sales.

MAJOR FEATURES-

  • Product wise Analytics – Here from the HexReport dashboard business owners can get a full insights of their sales based on products
  • Product wise Analytics – Here from the HexReport dashboard business owners can get a full insights of their sales based on category

1.0.1

Fixed some css issues.

There is no changelog
sections.installation:
The easy way.

Go to your WordPress Dashboard. Navigate to Plugins > Add New and then search for “HexReport”. Click on Install and then Activate the Plugin.

That’s it, HexReport Plugin is now activated on your site!

The hard way..

Download “HexReport” and then extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.
sections.faq:
Does this plugin requires WooCommerce to be installed ?

Yes

Is this plugin compatible on latest WordPress ?

Yes

screenshots.caption: In the HexReport dashboard store owners will get insights about total completed orders amount, cancelled orders amount, top-selling product amount, top-selling category amount and many more.
Sales by products page shows insights about some top-selling products data, for example: how many times they were sold, their selling ratio, and 12 months chart for top two selling product.
Sales by categories page shows insights about some top-selling categories data, for example: how many times they were sold, their selling ratio, and 12 months chart for top two selling category.
